testcase.name: Get a comment by name
testcase.system-out: Given I set GET comments service endpoint...................................passed When I search a comment by the name "alias odio sit"........................passed Then I should receive status code 200.......................................passed And I should see the email associated with the name.........................passed

testcase.name: Create a new user with POST request
testcase.system-out: Given I set POST user service endpoint......................................passed When I send a POST HTTP request.............................................passed Then I should receive user api status code 201..............................passed And I should receive a valid user ID in response............................passed

testcase.name: Update a user with PUT request
testcase.system-out: Given I set PUT user service endpoint for user with id 5....................passed When I update email, latitude and longitude of the user.....................passed Then I should receive user api status code 200..............................passed And I should see the updated email, latitude and longitude..................passed
